app.title: Semotool - All Tools in the World
app.name: Semotool

home.banner_desc: Solve it with all the tools in the world

search.empty_desc: Enter a calculator name to search.

desc.loan: Check monthly payments and total interest.
desc.savings: How much will you save monthly?
desc.salary: How much is my actual take-home pay?
desc.income_tax: Estimate tax based on taxable income.
desc.vat: Calculate Supply Price, VAT, and Total.
desc.property_tax: Simplified calc based on official price.

msg.local_tax_excluded: * Local tax (10%) excluded. Deductions not applied.
msg.simple_calc_warning: * Calculated results may differ from actual tax.
msg.gift_warning: * Based on 10-year aggregate. Actual tax may differ.

mortgage.desc: Check monthly payments and total interest.

rent_conversion.desc: Calculate rent amount when converting deposit.

investment.desc: Calculate how your assets grow with compound interest.

goal.desc: Calculate monthly savings needed to reach your financial goal.

holiday_allowance.desc: Check eligibility and calculate expected holiday allowance.
holiday_allowance.msg_disclaimer: * Eligible if working 15+ hours/week on average over 4 weeks.
holiday_allowance.msg_ineligible: Workers with less than 15 hours/week are not eligible.

compound.desc: Calculate how your assets grow with compound interest.

commission.desc: Calculate real estate brokerage fees. (Based on legal max)
commission.msg_rate_warning: * Max legal rate applies if empty.
commission.msg_disclaimer: * Above is the max legal fee. Actual fee is negotiated with the agent. VAT is separate.

acquisition.desc: Calculate the expected acquisition tax when purchasing real estate.
acquisition.msg_simple_calc_warning: * This is a rough estimate. Actual tax may vary based on property type, area, and location.

capital_gains.desc: Calculate Capital Gains Tax for real estate transactions. (Simplified)
capital_gains.msg_warning: * Basic deductions and expenses are not included. Consult a tax professional for accuracy.

comprehensive.desc: Calculate the expected Comprehensive Real Estate Tax on owned properties.
comprehensive.msg_warning: * This is an estimate based on simplified rules. Actual tax may differ due to property tax deductions, etc.

property.desc: Calculate Property Tax for home ownership. (Simplified)
property.msg_warning: * This is a rough estimate excluding city planning tax. Actual tax bill may vary.

inheritance.desc: Calculate expected Inheritance Tax on assets.
inheritance.msg_warning: * This is a rough estimate. Consult a tax expert for accurate calculation.

annuity.desc: How much can I receive monthly?

dutch_pay.desc: Calculate the amount per person by dividing the total amount by the number of people.
dutch_pay.msg_detail: Result of dividing {{total}} KRW by {{count}} people.

d_day.desc: Calculate remaining days (D-day) to a target date or check past dates.

world_clock.desc: Check current time in major cities in real-time.

discount.desc: Calculate final price and saved amount by applying discount rate.

tip.desc: Calculate tip amount and total payment based on tip percentage.

anniversary.desc: Calculate major anniversaries like 100 days, 1 year from a base date.

timer.desc: Countdown for a set amount of time.

stopwatch.desc: Precisely measure elapsed time and record laps.

gpa.msg_disclaimer: * The result is an arithmetic mean based on entered grades.

grade_predictor.desc: Calculate required final exam score for target grade.
grade_predictor.msg_hard: It might be difficult to achieve the target.

desc.health_risk: Simple health risk assessment based on lifestyle.
desc.body_fat: Estimate body fat based on measurements.
desc.ideal_weight: Find your ideal weight for your height.
desc.visceral_fat: Check visceral fat risk by waist circumference.

msg.navy_method: * Based on US Navy method. Results may vary.
msg.medical_disclaimer: * Not a medical diagnosis. For reference only.

sleep.desc: Calculate sleep score based on duration and quality.

stress.desc: Self-diagnose current stress level with a simple test.
stress.q1: How often have you felt unable to control important things?
stress.q2: How often have you felt confident about your ability to handle things?
stress.q3: How often have you felt that things were not going your way?
stress.q4: How often have you felt angry because of things that were outside of your control?
stress.q5: How often have you felt difficulties were piling up so high that you could not overcome them?

body_fat.desc: Estimate body fat percentage based on body measurements.

visceral_fat.desc: Assess visceral fat risk based on waist circumference.

ideal_weight.desc: Calculate BMI and check ideal weight range based on height and weight.

water_intake.desc: Calculate recommended daily water intake based on weight and activity level.

vo2_max.desc: Estimate VO2 Max using resting heart rate.
vo2_max.msg_no_data: No data for this age range.

bio_age.desc: Estimate biological age based on lifestyle habits.

metabolism.desc: Calculate BMR and TDEE to check daily calorie needs.

desc.area: Change Area units like Square Meter, Acre!
desc.time: Change Time units like Second, Hour!
desc.speed: Change Speed units like m/s, mph!
desc.data-storage: Change Data units like Byte, GB!
desc.energy: Change Energy units like Joule, Calorie!
desc.pressure: Change Pressure units like Pascal, Bar!
desc.angle: Change Angle units like Degree, Radian!
desc.force: Change Force units like Newton, kgf!
desc.power: Change Power units like Watt, Horsepower!
desc.frequency: Change Frequency units like Hertz, RPM!
desc.volume: Change Volume units like Liter, Gallon!

average.desc: Calculate the average of entered numbers.

percentage.desc: Calculate percentage by entering total value and rate.

bio.title: Biology Terms
bio.desc: Explore key terms and concepts in biology.

cell.meaning: Basic structural and functional unit of life
cell.desc: All living things are made of cells, which are the basis of life activities.

dna.desc: Double helix molecule that stores genetic information passed from parents to offspring.

mitochondria.desc: Organelle that generates energy (ATP) needed for life activities through cellular respiration.

photosynthesis.meaning: Converting light energy to chemical energy
photosynthesis.desc: Process where plants use light energy to create glucose and oxygen from carbon dioxide and water.

homeostasis.desc: Regulation mechanism to maintain body temperature, blood sugar, etc., to preserve life.

chromosome.meaning: Structure inside cell nucleus containing genes
chromosome.desc: Appears condensed during cell division and carries genetic information.

enzyme.desc: Protein that regulates speed of metabolic activities like digestion and respiration.

natural_selection.meaning: Evolutionary principle where fit individuals survive
natural_selection.desc: Core concept of evolution where traits advantageous for survival are passed to offspring.

idiom.title: Common Idioms
idiom.desc: Check out frequently used English idioms.

look_for.example: I am looking for my keys.

look_after.example: She looks after her little brother.

get_along_with.example: He gets along well with his colleagues.

give_up.example: Don't give up on your dreams.

take_care_of.example: I need to take care of this problem.

find_out.example: I will find out the truth.

dynasty.title: Dynasty Kings
dynasty.desc: Explore the lineage and major achievements of past kings.

taejo.name: Taejo (Yi Seong-gye)
taejo.achievement: Founder of Joseon. Moved capital to Hanyang.

taejong.name: Taejong (Yi Bang-won)
taejong.achievement: Strengthened royal power and implemented Six Ministries system.

sejong.name: Sejong (Yi Do)
sejong.achievement: Created Hunminjeongeum (Hangul) and advanced science and technology.

sejo.name: Sejo (Yi Yu)
sejo.achievement: Started compilation of Gyeongguk Daejeon and strengthened central power.

seongjong.name: Seongjong (Yi Hyeol)
seongjong.achievement: Completed Gyeongguk Daejeon and established Confucian rule.

seonjo.name: Seonjo (Yi Yeon)
seonjo.achievement: Imjin War occurred; attempted post-war recovery.

gwanghaegun.name: Gwanghaegun (Yi Hon)
gwanghaegun.achievement: Implemented neutral diplomacy and Daedong Law.

jeongjo.name: Jeongjo (Yi San)
jeongjo.achievement: Established Gyujanggak and built Hwaseong Fortress.

gojong.name: Gojong (Yi Hui)
gojong.achievement: Proclaimed Korean Empire and became Emperor.

taejo.name: Taejo (Wang Geon)
taejo.achievement: Founded Goryeo and implemented northern expansion policy.

gwhangjong.name: Gwangjong (Wang So)
gwhangjong.achievement: Implemented Slave Emancipation Act and Civil Service Exam.

gongmin.name: King Gongmin (Wang Jeon)
gongmin.achievement: Anti-Yuan reform policy and restored sovereignty.

history.title: History Timeline
history.desc: Explore major events throughout Korean history.

gojoseon.title: Founding of Gojoseon
gojoseon.desc: Dangun Wanggeom founded Gojoseon in Asadal.

silla.title: Founding of Silla
silla.desc: Park Hyeokgeose founded Silla in the Gyeongju area.

goguryeo.title: Founding of Goguryeo
goguryeo.desc: Jumong founded Goguryeo in the Jolbon area.

silla_update.title: Unification of Three Kingdoms
silla_update.desc: Silla drove out Tang forces and unified the peninsula south of the Daedong River.

balhae.title: Founding of Balhae
balhae.desc: Dae Jo-yeong founded Balhae on Dongmo Mountain.

goryeo_found.title: Founding of Goryeo
goryeo_found.desc: Wang Geon overthrew Taebong and founded Goryeo.

goryeo_unify.title: Unification of Later Three Kingdoms
goryeo_unify.desc: Goryeo defeated Later Baekje and achieved national reunification.

joseon_found.title: Founding of Joseon
joseon_found.desc: Yi Seong-gye founded Joseon after retreating from Wihwado.

hunminjeongeum.title: Creation of Hunminjeongeum
hunminjeongeum.desc: King Sejong the Great created the Korean alphabet, Hangul.

imjin.title: Outbreak of Imjin War
imjin.desc: A seven-year war began with the Japanese invasion.

empire.title: Proclamation of Korean Empire
empire.desc: Gojong ascended as Emperor, aiming for a modern state system.

annexation.title: Japan-Korea Annexation Treaty
annexation.desc: The Japanese colonial period began with the annexation treaty.

march_first.title: March 1st Movement & Provisional Gov
march_first.desc: Nationwide independence movement and establishment of Provisional Government in Shanghai.

liberation.title: Liberation (Aug 15)
liberation.desc: Korea achieved liberation with Japan's surrender.

gov_est.title: Establishment of Govt
gov_est.desc: Constituent Assembly formed and Republic of Korea government officially launched.

korean_war.title: Korean War
korean_war.desc: The tragedy of fratricidal war began with North Korea's invasion.

april_rev.title: April Revolution
april_rev.desc: Student revolution that defended democracy against election fraud.

june_struggle.title: June Democratic Struggle
june_struggle.desc: Nationwide democratic movement that led to direct presidential elections.

physics.title: Physics Formulas
physics.desc: Check out the essence of physical laws that move the world.
physics.note:
※ Physics formulas are based on SI units. 
Essential formulas covered in basic and general physics courses.

kinetic.title: Kinetic Energy
kinetic.desc: Energy possessed by a moving object (v is velocity).

potential.title: Potential Energy (Gravity)
potential.desc: Potential energy possessed by an object at height (h).

gravity.title: Law of Universal Gravitation
gravity.desc: Attractive force between two masses (r is distance).

power.title: Electric Power
power.desc: Electric energy consumed per unit time.

coulomb.title: Coulomb's Law
coulomb.desc: Interaction force between two electric charges.

mass_energy.title: Mass-Energy Equivalence
mass_energy.desc: Mass and energy can be converted into each other (c is speed of light).

photoelectric.title: Photoelectric Effect
photoelectric.desc: Energy of light is proportional to frequency (f).

math.title: Math Formulas
math.desc: Check major math formulas by category.
math.note:
※ Formulas are expressed in standard LaTeX format. 
 Key formulas used in basic education are listed first.

quadratic.title: Quadratic Formula
quadratic.desc: Formula to find the roots of quadratic equation ax² + bx + c = 0

square.title: Perfect Square Formula
square.desc: Expansion of the square of the sum of two terms

diff_squares.title: Difference of Squares
diff_squares.desc: Factoring the difference of two squares

log.title: Basic Properties of Logarithms
log.desc: Product of arguments is sum of logarithms

pythagoras.title: Pythagorean Theorem
pythagoras.desc: Relation between the three sides of a right triangle

circle_area.title: Area of a Circle
circle_area.desc: Area of a circle with radius r

sphere_vol.title: Volume of a Sphere
sphere_vol.desc: Total volume of a sphere with radius r

heron.title: Heron's Formula
heron.desc: Area of a triangle given the length of three sides (s is semi-perimeter)

derivative.title: Definition of Derivative
derivative.desc: Limit expression to find instantaneous rate of change

integral.title: Fundamental Theorem of Calculus
integral.desc: Theorem relating definite and indefinite integrals

periodic.title: Periodic Table
periodic.desc: Quickly check information on major elements.

constitution.title: Constitution Summary
constitution.desc: Check the key articles of the Constitution that are the foundation of the Republic of Korea.
constitution.note:
※ The above is a selection of key contents from the preamble of the Constitution that the general public should know. 
The full text can be found at the National Law Information Center.

1_1.title: Democratic Republic
1_1.content: The Republic of Korea shall be a democratic republic.

1_2.title: Popular Sovereignty
1_2.content: The sovereignty of the Republic of Korea shall reside in the people, and all state authority shall emanate from the people.

3.title: Territory
3.content: The territory of the Republic of Korea shall consist of the Korean Peninsula and its adjacent islands.

10.title: Human Dignity
10.content: All citizens shall be assured of human worth and dignity and have the right to pursue happiness.

11_1.title: Equality
11_1.content: All citizens shall be equal before the law. No one shall be discriminated against on account of sex, religion or social status.

21_1.title: Freedom of Speech
21_1.content: All citizens shall enjoy freedom of speech and the press, and freedom of assembly and association.

24.title: Right to Vote
24.content: All citizens shall have the right to vote under the conditions as prescribed by Act.

31_1.title: Right to Education
31_1.content: All citizens shall have an equal right to receive an education corresponding to their abilities.

34_1.title: Right to Decent Life
34_1.content: All citizens shall be entitled to a life worthy of human beings.

37_2.title: Limitation of Rights
37_2.content: The freedoms and rights of citizens may be restricted by Act only when necessary for national security, the maintenance of law and order or for public welfare. Even when such restriction is imposed, no essential aspect of the freedom or right shall be violated.

grammar.title: Basic English Grammar
grammar.desc: Essential English grammar rules you must know.

present_continuous.title: Present Continuous
present_continuous.example: I am reading a book now.

present_perfect.title: Present Perfect
present_perfect.usage: Actions started in past affecting present (have/has + p.p)
present_perfect.example: I have lived here for 10 years.

past_continuous.title: Past Continuous
past_continuous.usage: Actions in progress at a specific past time (was/were + V-ing)
past_continuous.example: They were playing soccer at 5 PM.

must.title: Must (Strong Obligation)
must.example: He must be tired after work.

hanja.title: Essential Hanja
hanja.desc: Learn and search for basic level Hanja characters.

verbs.title: Irregular Verbs
verbs.desc: Check the 3 forms of essential English irregular verbs.

worldmap.title: World Map
worldmap.desc: Learn the location and key information of major countries.

korea.name: South Korea
korea.desc: Peninsula country in East Asia, IT powerhouse and center of Hallyu.

usa.name: USA
usa.desc: Federal republic in North America, world's largest economy.

china.name: China
china.desc: Most populous country and economic giant in East Asia.

japan.name: Japan
japan.desc: Island country in East Asia with advanced technology and unique culture.

uk.name: UK
uk.desc: Island nation in NW Europe, birthplace of Industrial Revolution.

france.name: France
france.desc: Country of art and gastronomy, center of European history and culture.

germany.name: Germany
germany.desc: Manufacturing and tech powerhouse driving European economy.

brazil.name: Brazil
brazil.desc: Largest country in South America, famous for Amazon rainforest and Samba.

australia.name: Australia
australia.desc: Representative country of Oceania, entire continent is one nation.

egypt.name: Egypt
egypt.desc: Birthplace of ancient civilization symbolized by Pyramids and Sphinx.
